Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Grants David Ladd retroactive Tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Grants David Ladd retroactive Tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT granting David Ladd retroactive Tier IV membership in the New York state and local employees' retirement system
